name: Chowtown
description:
You've woken up in Chowtown and it all seems wrong. Just wrong. Maybe it's supposed to be like this. Maybe if you find that rascally dog that took your shoes, you can walk back home. What's that? An absurd point and click adventure featuring food, live music, segregation, and...intrigue? Don't miss the exit for Chowtown. You may never be able to leave.

Content Warning : Contains some adult language, abrasive audio, and weird stuff


Keyboard & Mouse
MovementRight Click
InteractLeft Click
Crouch
Control / C
Cycle Inventory
Mouse Scroll Wheel
Map / Fast TravelTab / M

Created for $104 adventure game challenge jam 

https://itch.io/jam/104-adventure-game-challenge

Theme: A delusion


Release notes: v0.0.92 -

-A little rough around the edges, rushed for the jam, and a little empty.

-I think I forgot to make the quit button function.

-Please let me know any mega bugs you find around or any suggestions you might have. Maybe more to come someday.
